long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension saves your precious time and effort when you want to watch series in Sdarot.tv.
It plays the wanted episode you choose, reloads the page if there is a server error when loading the episode, and even login to your Sdarot account automaticlly!
All you need to do is:
1. Install the extension
2. Go to Sdarot.tv website (in any way you want)
3. Press the extension icon and enter your Sdarot account credentials for auto login whenever you want to use Sdarot  (this step is optional, we do not save or use your credentials for any use except helping you).
4. Search your serias and pick your wanted episode to watch
5. Sit back and enjoy, we will play your episode automaticlly when it will be ready.
